availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Madison based farmer. Married Matilda Covington.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860); Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870); U.S., Find a Grave Index, 1600s-Current, “Coleman Covington (1800-1874)” https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=covington&GSfn=coleman&GSby=1840&GSbyrel=before&GSdyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=175363703&df=all& (Accessed February 12, 2017)
